name: UIStoryboardSegue
desc: An object that prepares for and performs the visual transition between two view controllers.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, source: UIViewController, destination: UIViewController)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a storyboard segue object for use in performing a segue.

items.name: var source: UIViewController
items.desc: The source view controller for the segue.

items.name: var destination: UIViewController
items.desc: The destination view controller for the segue.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the segue object.

items.name: func perform()
items.desc: Performs the visual transition for the segue.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, source: UIViewController, destination: UIViewController, performHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a segue that calls a block to perform the segue transition.
